title: Alcatel 3T10 with Speaker 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 10 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Midnight Blue)

product_specification.Additional Features: Face Unlock, FM Radio, Dual Speakers, Far Field AI Voice Control, Wi-Fi Display
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, USB Cable, Bluetooth Speaker, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Wi-Fi Direct, OTG and Bluetooth Support
product_specification.Other Display Features: HD LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.2-in-1 Portable Design: You can view images, videos, and more easily on the Fast-Access display. This display can is launched after the tablet is mounted on the Audio Station. It also has a detachable 2-in-1 portable design so that you can carry and use it anytime and anywhere. To top it off, you can also use Google Assistant smoothly in this tablet.
product_description.Powerful Sound System: Get an enhanced sound experience with this device. The external dock speakers (2*5 W) that come with double bass enhancement render intense bass thumps and crystal-clear audio. The speaker unit is powered by a 2000 mAh battery, that delivers high-quality sound for up to seven hours. Also, the in-built dual speakers can further accentuate your listening experience. So, you can enjoy your favourite songs clearly and without any distortion.
product_description.Connectivity Options: Enjoy songs, movies, TV series, and more by connecting external devices to it. It also features a 3.5-mm Auxiliary port, and a Micro-USB and Micro SD card reader. Also, it provides you with up to seven hours of station life so that you can stay entertained cordlessly for hours. What's more, it's versatile Audio Station lets you easily mount the device on it and use it conveniently.
product_description.Google Assistant: It features Google Assistant, which makes controlling your tablet more convenient. And, the far-field DSP voice recognition technology allows this device to detect your voice from a distance of up to 3 m. So, you need to pair it with your smart home devices and speak to the tablet to control the temperature, adjust the lights, etc. Also, you can ask questions, make calls, hear the latest news, and more, easily.
product_description.Android 9 Pie: Featuring the Android 9 Pie operating system, this device delivers seamless performance. You can experience and harness the power of AI, as it includes features such as Adaptive Brightness and Adaptive Battery.
product_description.High-quality Performance: It is powered by a 4080 mAh Battery that enables it to function effectively for hours. It also comes with 2 GB of RAM and 16 GB of RAM. So, store your favourite movies, TV shows, songs, photos, apps, and more without worrying about storage space.
product_description.Face Key: The Face Key feature, which uses a 30º detection radius and 106 key points, lets you unlock or access the tablet easily and instantly.
product_description.Design: The Alcatel 3T 10's design adds more efficiency to its performance. It comes with a Multi-device stand, a Foldable Back Stand, a Matt Rubber Base, an LED Indicator, and a 110° Folding Angle. Also, it comes with a Speaker Grill Cloth, and Matt Covered Cones with CD Spin Effect.

review:
Delivery is too late....😡😡😡😤😤😤😒😒 I got this 10 days after book my order.....and I prepaid also.......


Good tab....👌....camera is so poor...👎 battery backup is too good...👌...tab performance is normal... Little bit slow.....but ok...👍👍🙂.... display is little bit fade....but when you play hd video's it's give you awesome quality of video experience....👌👌👍👍😊

And I love the bluetooth speaker...it's products awesome quality sound with bass...😘😘😘👌👌👌

Overall it's a good tab.....for using Facebook... whatsapp... YouTube or watching movies....👍👌🙂

I satisfied with this tab....in this money...😊👍

Good tablet in up to 10k range with good features and amazing speaker.
good for entertainment purpose.
display is 720p supported.
dual speaker inbuilt in tab.

Excellent Tablet with a blend of good performance and specs with affordable pricing.
It is surely the best affordable multimedia android tablet in its range Comes with Dual inbuilt stereo Speakers along with audio station having two speakers of 5W each resulting in a mesmerizing audio experience with crystal clear sound and high bass. Light weight (440g) with firm build, HD display ,4G VOLTE, Good battery Life and Nice UI.

Audio Station, earphones, charger, USB cable and a screen protector are all bundled along with the tablet in the package. Moreover It runs on Stock Android Pie and has Google Assistant and Google Home built in making it a smart home hub as well. The tablet also supports pass through charging wherein the tablet charges when it is docked on the audio station.

The Alcatel 3T 10 is truly a 3 in 1 device, being a gorgeous 10 inch tablet along with Call facility, Google Smart Home Hub and Audio Station all at a fabulous price

For Work, Binge-Watching Or E-Learning, This Tablet Will Handle Them All Without breaking a sweat and then some

Bought it for 9k,totally worth it at that price,...
Audio station is a beaut and overall good for reasonable daily use
If you want a 10 inch screen, an audio station, calling tablet with great sound for reasonable daily use... Go for it

Got the tablet cum Bluetooth speaker for just 7499 rs during the Big saving days. Wow! What an amazing experience and product. The tablet is very fast, responsive and the inbuilt stereo speakers are treat to the ears. The bluetooth speaker is very impressive, looks elegant and is loud. I can recommend this product to all. Thankyou.

it looks gorgeous, and the performance really really worth the price.when I received I had a feeling that the display is dull but after removing the mat finish protection cover I felt WOW...really a great product.I recommend.

1st I got this product on sale around 7K. Initially, I got a defective piece and got replaced by Flipkart.
After using almost one month I will list out the Pros and Cons below.

Pros:-
1.Price-wise great value for money.
2. 10-inch screen
3. If you looking out for only watching videos and attending zoom calls this performs well.
4. Speaker is good.
5. Battery wise I can say Average backup but at this price range, we cannot expect more.
6. 4g SIM inclusion is great

Cons:-
1. Observed too much of LAG
2. Google assistance is not all working.
3. When the tab is connected to Speaker for every 10 to 15 min it will disconnect and automatically reconnect.
4. Observed heating problem.


Finally, if you are looking out to buy this product I will say if you want this tab only for videos watching and zoom calls go for it.

pros.Sound Quality: This tablet features an impressive bluetooth dual speaker which is loud and gives a soothing hearing experience.

cons.Performance: The MediaTek Quad Core processor and 2GB RAM combination of this tablet is very slow and lags too much.
cons.4080 mAh Battery: This tablet comes with just a 4080 mAh battery which gives a poor performance and drains fast. Doesn't give an optimal backup.
cons.Camera: The 5MP camera of this tablet is very poor and not at all suitable for photography purpose.

summary.verdict: The Alcatel 3T10 with Speaker Tablet is a good choice if audio is the primary need but lacks in other aspects.
summary.Additional Information: Supports Jio sim, Contains face unlock.
